Class MouseButtonEvent

java.lang.Object
io.github.kale_ko.gighm.events.types.Event
io.github.kale_ko.gighm.events.types.CancellableEvent
io.github.kale_ko.gighm.events.types.input.MouseButtonEvent
public class MouseButtonEvent extends CancellableEvent
A mouse button event Fires whenever a mouse button is pressed or released
Since:
1.6.0
